    • Uses of StreamPartitioner in org.apache.flink.streaming.partitioner

      Subclasses of StreamPartitioner in org.apache.flink.streaming.partitioner 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BroadcastPartitioner<T>
      Partitioner that selects all the output channels.
      class  DistributePartitioner<T>
      Partitioner that distributes the data equally by cycling through the output channels.
      class  FieldsPartitioner<T>
      Partitioner that selects the same (one) channel for two Tuples having a specified fields equal.
      class  GlobalPartitioner<T> 
      class  ShufflePartitioner<T>
      Partitioner that distributes the data equally by selecting one output channel randomly.
